name: ada-marina-ops
description: Operational capabilities for West Istanbul Marina management. Handles berthing, traffic, and physical assets.

tools.name: scan_radar_sector
tools.description: Scans a specific maritime sector for vessel traffic using simulated Kpler/AIS data.

tools.name: assign_berth_smart
tools.description: Calculates the optimal berth assignment based on vessel dimensions and live weather conditions.

tools.name: control_iot_asset
tools.description: Sends command to physical marina assets (Pedestals, Gates, Lights) via MQTT.
